mods.abstract: Abstract: On the occasion of the 65th birthday of Prof. Dr. Rudolf Vetschera, colleagues from all over the world contributed their works in order to compile an issue that is meant as a tribute to his achievements, wisdom, and kindness.

titleInfo.title: Central European Journal of Operations Research
